story: ...just gotten out of a bad breakup and created a Tinder account to keep my mind off the breakup. After about a week of talking, we decided to meet up at a local bar for drinks...

We were at a crossroads and so after a few months of casually dating, we decided to end things. I was in love but thought this love story wasn't meant to last. Fast forward 9 months, and we had become inseperable.
For all the single people out there,especially introverted ones like us:do not be afriad to travel outside of your comfort zone. That's where you'll make a genuine...
